product_description: A cork and espadrille-style platform wedge lends summery height to a chic sandal designed with a foam-cushioned footbed for all-day comfort.
product_details_and_care:
A cork and espadrille-style platform wedge lends summery height to a chic sandal designed with a foam-cushioned footbed for all-day comfort.
2 3/4" heel; 3/4" platform (size 8.5)
Adjustable ankle strap with buckle closure
Leather upper/synthetic lining/rubber sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
